doc.title: Layer
doc.desc: The Layer class is a class for managing layers.

member.name: Layer

argitem.name: window
argitem.desc: Specifies the window (an object of the Window class) that will own this layer. Once the window is determined, it cannot be changed.

argitem.name: parent
argitem.desc: Specifies the parent layer for this layer. If null is specified, it becomes the primary layer. Only one primary layer can exist in a window, and it is the parent of all layers that must exist if layers are used. However, depending on the drawing device (configurable with Window.drawDevice), some windows can have multiple primary layers. The parent of a layer can be changed with the Layer.parent property.

member.desc: Constructs an object of the Layer class. The Layer class is constructed in a hidden state.

member.name: onClick

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the layer was clicked.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the layer was clicked.

member.desc: Occurs when the layer is clicked.

member.name: onDoubleClick

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the layer was double-clicked.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the layer was double-clicked.

member.desc: Occurs when the layer is double-clicked.

member.name: onMouseDown

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the mouse button was pressed.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the mouse button was pressed.

argitem.name: button
argitem.desc: The mouse button that was pressed. It will be one of the following values. mbLeft : The left mouse button was pressed mbMiddle : The middle mouse button was pressed mbRight : The right mouse button was pressed mbX1 : The first side mouse button was pressed mbX2 : The second side mouse button was pressed

argitem.name: shift
argitem.desc: The state of the shift keys that were pressed simultaneously when the mouse button was pressed. It is a combination of the following values by bitwise OR. ssAlt : The ALT key was pressed ssShift : The SHIFT key was pressed ssCtrl : The CTRL key was pressed

member.desc: Occurs when a mouse button is pressed.

member.name: onMouseUp

argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the mouse button was released.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the mouse button was released.

argitem.name: button
argitem.desc: The mouse button that was released. It will be one of the following values. mbLeft : The left mouse button was released mbMiddle : The middle mouse button was released mbRight : The right mouse button was released mbX1 : The first side mouse button was released mbX2 : The second side mouse button was released

argitem.name: shift
argitem.desc: The state of the shift keys that were pressed simultaneously when the mouse button was released. It is a combination of the following values by bitwise OR. ssAlt : The ALT key was pressed ssShift : The SHIFT key was pressed ssCtrl : The CTRL key was pressed

member.desc: Occurs when a mouse button is released.

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the mouse moved.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in the layer's display coordinates) where the mouse moved.

argitem.name: shift
argitem.desc: The state of the shift keys and mouse buttons that were pressed simultaneously when the mouse moved. It is a combination of the following values by bitwise OR. ssAlt : The ALT key was pressed ssShift : The SHIFT key was pressed ssCtrl : The CTRL key was pressed ssLeft : The left mouse button was pressed ssMiddle : The middle mouse button was pressed ssRight : The right mouse button was pressed

member.name: onMouseEnter
member.desc: Occurs when the mouse enters the layer's area.

member.name: onMouseLeave
member.desc: Occurs when the mouse leaves the layer's area.
